author: Prashanth Chintala
text:
The Union government will come out with a new civil aviation policy by next month, according to the Minister for Civil Aviation, P. Ashok Gajapathi Raju.

“We are working on the policy. It is in an advanced stage. We are hopeful that the policy will be out by April 2016,” the Minister told media persons here on Wednesday.

While addressing a press conference following the inauguration of India Aviation 2016, Gajapathi Raju said several suggestions have been received since the draft policy was up with 22 items.
title: ‘New aviation policy soon’
